duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide objective feedback on products or items using sensory evaluation techniques.
Use all five senses to evaluate products and provide feedback quantitatively or qualitatively.
Occasionally provide additional feedback via debrief sessions and assist in new method development.
Follow company rules on safety, quality, and conduct.
Keep information, data, products, and methods used in the sensory panel in confidence.
Assist in study setup or other small tasks as time allows and adhere to company guidelines.
Not participate in consumer research involving household care products.
Adhere to company guidelines regarding attendance, conduct, and other items not covered specifically.
